issuetype.description: A small piece of work that's part of a larger task.
issuetype.name: Sub-task

content.text: How to Write a Business Description to appear in AI Overview
Business Name + What You Do + Location (if local)
“GreenLeaf Landscaping is a full-service landscaping company in Denver, CO, offering lawn care, garden design, and tree maintenance.”
Include industry-specific terms and categories (e.g., “eco-friendly cleaning service,” “licensed HVAC contractor”).
Awards, certifications, years in business, or partnerships help AI rank your business as credible.
Naturally add your primary keywords (services + location).
Example: “digital marketing agency in Austin” or “24/7 emergency plumber in Dallas.”
(Yelp, Bing, Nextdoor, BBB, Crunchbase, Clutch, etc.).
Consistency strengthens AI recognition and increases the chance of inclusion in summaries.
“Contact us today for a free consultation.”
and then tweak slightly for each site.
Review done and assigned to maa’m

fields.summary: Quora Task

content.text: . These are the 10 quora questions I have given. Please answer each question in human tone, no copy paste from chatgpt, as Quora is getting banned. Also answer should not be too lengthy but write like an expert.
clear, concise definition or direct answer
Example: “To rank on Google, you need keyword optimization, quality backlinks, and fast-loading pages.”
Use variations in subheadings or bullet points.
bullet points, numbered lists, or short paragraphs
Mention credible data, your professional experience, or cite studies.
practical steps, tips, or real examples
Example: Instead of saying “Do SEO,” say “Use tools like SEMrush to find keywords and optimize your meta tags.”
- Completed the 10 Quora Answers as per the guidelines. Please review:
, as per GPTzero it is showing 100% AI generated & as per zerogpt it is showing 81% AI generated. Please fix this it should be less than 10% in both.
Maa’m please review this Quora Docs.
Not up to the mark. Many answers were just short and rather irrelevant. It's possible to get short and human-sounding answers from GPT. Needs rework in places.
Please work upon the Daya maam feedback
Review few. Yet to review more
